TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Qngqaya_Cinun, title = Qngqaya_Cinun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qngqaya_Cinun} }

S.FORM: Qngqaya Cinun 織布工具 Tunan Truku sbiyaw o spagan qabang ka babaw dxgal, kiya do psaan dha babaw snpagan qabang ka ubung, tluunghiya ka kuyuh Truku, mangal wahu. Qaya cinun o saw nii, 1.ubung,snalu qhuni, djiyun tminun. 2.qataq , snalu qhuni,djiyunmslagu waray cinun. 3.knisul(kusut),snalu djima,djiyun dhug waray. 4.buji(sntruma)snalu djima, djiyun daqut matas. 5.bgiya, snalu qhuni, djiyun ptasil waray. 6. kikut, snalu djima,djiyun pskrut tninun . 7.gikus, snalu djima,djiyun peaway waray tminun.. 8.wahug cinun ,tnunan waray nuqih, , djiyun pskrut haut hwihuk. 9.jisayan , snalu qhuni,djiyun psbkug waray psaun ubung. . 10.ciyadan , snalu djima,djiyun snuyuk nuqih . 11.surul , snalu buut samat, djiyun psdhug ciyadan smuyuk nuqih . 12.bluhing , snalu djima, djiyun psaan waray nuqih. 13.gluq walu snalu kahat walu, djiyun psdhriq waray nuqih . 14.dowsan snalu djima, djiyun msbkug waray. 15.daus, snalu qhuni,djiyun maqaxwaray. 16.smlaan, snalu djima, djiyun pdangaw waray pdaun bgiya.

Qngqaya Cinon 織布工具 Tonan Troko sbiyaw o spagan qabang ka babaw dxgal, kiya do psaan dha babaw snpagan qabang ka obong, tloonghiya ka koyoh Troko, mangal waho. Qaya cinon o saw nii, 1.obong,snalo qhoni, djiyon tminon. 2.qataq , snalo qhoni,djiyonmslago waray cinon. 3.knisol(kosot),snalo djima,djiyon dhog waray. 4.boji(sntroma)snalo djima, djiyon daqot matas. 5.bgiya, snalo qhoni, djiyon ptasil waray. 6. kikot, snalo djima,djiyon pskrot tninon . 7.gikos, snalo djima,djiyon peaway waray tminon.. 8.wahog cinon ,tnonan waray noqih, , djiyon pskrot haot hwihok. 9.jisayan , snalo qhoni,djiyon psbkog waray psaon obong. . 10.ciyadan , snalo djima,djiyon snoyok noqih . 11.sorol , snalo boot samat, djiyon psdhog ciyadan smoyok noqih . 12.blohing , snalo djima, djiyon psaan waray noqih. 13.gloq walo snalo kahat walo, djiyon psdhriq waray noqih . 14.dowsan snalo djima, djiyon msbkog waray. 15.daos, snalo qhoni,djiyon maqaxwaray. 16.smlaan, snalo djima, djiyon pdangaw waray pdaon bgiya.
